short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make popups open as tabs instead of windows.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Do popup windows annoy you? Are they too small? Do you want those windows to let you edit the URL or click your bookmarks? Would you prefer a regular browser window? Here is your solution! Open all those popups as regular tabs. Make them behave like any other tab, just like you always wanted!
